Be sure to delete these directories before running the new update to avoid any potential issues.

What should I do if I have last launched VRSCTEST from a version prior to this new update?

If you have last launched VRSCTEST from a version prior to this new update, you need to delete the following directories before running this new update. The directories to delete depend on your operating system:

* For Linux: `~/.komodo/vrsctest`
* For MacOS: `⁨Users⁩/⁨{YourUserName}/⁨Library⁩/⁨Application Support⁩/⁨Komodo/vrsctest`
* For Windows: `"%APPDATA%"\Komodo\VRSCTEST`
